name: RPG Attack Generator
description: Generates RPG attacks given a weapon
context:
[ RANDOM ATTACK GENERATOR ]
[ Given a player and an enemy, generates a player attack description and deducts the damages/wounds and status. ]

list.enemy: [ Name: Orc; difficulty: hard; armor: Leather Armor; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: alive ]
list.description: You attack the orc using your bare hands. The orc is quite a good fighter, and dodges or blocks all your attacks, but also gets tired from the efforts.

list.enemy: [ Name: Orc; difficulty: medium; armor: Leather Armor; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: alive ]
list.description: You attack the orc using your fists. It's not very effective, but you manage to break the orc's nose.

list.enemy: [ Name: Orc; difficulty: medium; armor: Leather Armor; wounds: broken nose; blood loss: minor; status: slightly wounded ]
list.description: You strike the orc with your iron sword. You cut into orc's stomach and guts, spreading his blood everywhere

list.enemy: [ Name: Orc; difficulty: medium; armor: Leather Armor; wounds: broken nose, broken ribs, eviscerated; blood loss: major; status: heavily wounded ]
list.description: You punch the semi-conscious orc in the torso. Your blows doesn't do much, but the orc finally succumbs to his severe wounds and dies.

list.enemy: [ Name: Orc; difficulty: medium; armor: Leather Armor; wounds: broken nose, broken ribs; blood loss: none; status: heavily wounded ]
list.description: You swing your iron longsword at the orc. Due to his wounds, he fails to dodge and you cut his head off.

list.enemy: [ Name: Goblin; difficulty: easy; armor: Cloth Armor; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: alive ]
list.description: You attack the goblin using your bare fists. The goblin is quite aa agile fighter, and dodges most of your attacks.

list.enemy: [ Name: Goblin; difficulty: easy; armor: Cloth Armor; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: alive ]
list.description: You slash the goblin with your knife across the chest. The goblin's cloth armor does nothing for protection, it slowly starts to bleed from the cut.

list.enemy: [ Name: Goblin; difficulty: easy; armor: Cloth Armor; wounds: slashed chest; blood loss: moderate; status: slightly wounded ]
list.description: You pierce the goblin with your wooden spear. Your speer flies into the goblin's stomach and guts, spreading his blood and intestines everywhere.

list.player: [ Rare Large Steel Axe; Leather Armor ]
list.enemy: [ Name: Kobold; difficulty: easy; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: alive ]
list.description: You swing your steel axe at the boar with strength, severing its right leg

list.player: [ Rare Small Copper Dagger; Leather Armor ]
list.enemy: [ Name: Kobold; difficulty: easy; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: alive ]
list.description: You swiftly attack the kobold with your copper dagger, cutting his left ear right off

list.enemy: [ Name: Kobold; difficulty: easy; wounds: lacerations (right arm), severed limb (left arm); blood loss: major; status: wounded ]
list.description: You stab the enemy in the chest, pushing the blade deep through the kobold's hearth. The kobold is badly wounded and doesn't even fight back.

list.enemy: [ Name: Troll; difficulty: very hard; wounds: light bleeding, eviscerated, amputated (right leg); blood loss: major; status: gravely wounded ]
list.description: You strike the troll with your wooden club, only doing light bruises on its torso. The troll is however badly in shape and bleeding profusely. He just crumbles to the floor, dead.
